name: IVY
description:
IVY by TRAB

Use the Left and Right arrow keys to grow.

Solve puzzles by connecting every stone!

Don't grow too far, though, or you'll wither away.

My first Ludum Dare Compo submission, made for LD34 in 48 hours. Yes, I made the music, too. It was super fun.

The themes were Two Buttons and Growing. I decided to try both!

Ludum Dare 34: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

The Stencyl source file can be found below.

Thanks for playing!
